title: Man Judge

nouns: Judges are officials who presides over a court of law, either alone or as part of a panel, and make determinations about the applicability of the law to the facts presented.
A judge presides over court proceedings, either alone or as a part of a panel of judges.
The title of a justice of court.
A public official authorized to decide questions brought before a court of justice
A person who decides the fate of someone or something that has been called into question.
Official who presides over court proceedings
An official who presides over a court
Someone deciding another's fate.
The idea or act of being just or fair
The quality of being just or fair
State of being just or fair.
Justice is a concept involving the fair, moral, and impartial treatment of all persons.
One of the four cardinal virtues
The state or characteristic of being just or fair.
Justice, in its broadest context, includes both the attainment of that which is just and the philosophical discussion of that which is just.
Concept of moral fairness and administration of the law
Justice is one of the four cardinal virtues in classical European philosophy and Roman Catholicism.
Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
An adult male human.
A man is a male human.
An adult male human
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

description: A man who presides over court proceedings, wearing the traditional black gown and wielding a gavel.
apple_vendor_description: This Apple emoji portrays a distinguished man in the role of a judge, complete with a solemn expression and classic attire. On Apple devices, he wears a dark robe, subtly textured and highlighted with Apple's characteristic realistic lighting to convey depth and gravitas. The judge's face, rendered with smooth gradients and soft rounded edges, appears wise and authoritative, with furrowed brows and a firm set to his lips, suggesting fairness and impartiality. This emoji is ideal for discussions about justice, law, decisions, or when seeking a sense of authority and finality in digital communication.
